children.qtip: 100 metre wind direction is indicated by the arrows, and the arrow length is proportional to the wind speed
children.source: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

children.qtip: Maximum 10m wind gust over an interval. The maximum wind gust is computed in the period from the forecast validation time (VT) to (VT - selected interval).
children.source: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

children.qtip: Cloud cover derived from model level cloud cover between 450 hPa and the model top using maximum-random overlap
children.source: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

children.qtip: Cloud cover derived from model level cloud cover between 450 and 800 hPa using maximum-random overlap
children.source: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

children.qtip: Cloud cover derived from model level cloud cover between surface and 800 hPa using maximum-random overlap
children.source: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

children.source: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

children.text: Mean direction and height of total swell [ECMWF]
children.qtip: Mean direction of total swell (mdts) is indicated by the arrows, and the arrow length is proportional to the significant height of total swell
children.source: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

children.qtip: Minimum temperature at 2 metres  over an interval.Minimum temperature at 2 metres at each time steps are used to compute the minimum 2mT over the given interval, period being forecast valid time(VT) - selected interval
children.source: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

children.text: Snow coverage as percentage of a grid box [ECMWF]
children.qtip: Snow cover represented as percentage of a grid box computed from snow depth. Liquid water density is assumed 1000 kg/m3 and 10cm snow depth is assumed to cover the whole grid box.
children.source: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

children.text: Probability of combined events of 2 metre Temperature and total precipitation [ECMWF]
children.qtip: Probability of  combined events of 2 metre temperature and total preciptation from ensemble forecast. The probability is computed as the ratio of the number of the ensemble members in which both event conditions are met to the total number of ensemble members. In case of 2 metre temperature, event threshold and operator are controlled by user. In case of total preciptation, event threshold, operator and the accumulation period of total precipitation are controlled by the user.
children.source: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

children.text: Probability of combined events of wind gust and total snowfall [ECMWF]
children.qtip: Probability of combined events of wind gust and total snowfall from ensemble forecast. The probability is computed as the ratio of the number of the ensemble members in which both event conditions are met to the total number of ensemble members. In case of wind gust, event threshold and operator are controlled by user. In case of total preciptation, event threshold, operator and the accumulation period of total snowfall are controlled by the user.
children.source: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

children.text: Probability of combined events of wind speed and total precipitation [ECMWF]
children.qtip: Probability of combined events of wind speed and total preciptation from ensemble forecast. The probability is computed as the ratio of the number of the ensemble members in which both event conditions are met to the total number of ensemble members. In case of wind speed, event threshold and operator are controlled by user. In case of total preciptation, event threshold, operator and the accumulation period of total precipitation are controlled by the user.
children.source: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

children.text: Sea ice cover as fraction of a grid box [ECMWF]
children.qtip: Fraction of a grid box that is covered with sea ice. Sea ice cover is kept constant during forecast
children.source: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts
